welcome_message: UP FOR A FEW ROUNDS OF GWENT?
draw_info: The battle cannot end in a draw. You can play a rematch using the same decks or surrender.

realms.name: Northern Realms
realms.description: Draw a card from your deck whenever you win a round.

nilfgaard.name: Nilfgaardian Empire
nilfgaard.description: Wins any round that ends in a draw.

monsters.name: Monsters
monsters.description: Keeps a random Unit Card out after each round.

skellige.name: Skellige
skellige.description: 2 random cards from the graveyard are placed on the battlefield at the start of the third round.

clear.name: Clear Weather
clear.description: Removes all Weather Cards (Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog and Torrential Rain) effects.

frost.name: Biting Frost
frost.description: Sets the strength of all Close Combat cards to 1 for both players.

fog.name: Impenetrable Fog
fog.description: Sets the strength of all Ranged Combat cards to 1 for both players.

rain.name: Torrential Rain
rain.description: Sets the strength of all Siege Combat cards to 1 for both players.

storm.name: Skellige Storm
storm.description: Reduces the Strength of all Range and Siege Units to 1.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: Not affected by any Special Cards or abilities.

decoy.name: Decoy
decoy.description: Swap with a card on the battlefield to return it to your hand.

horn.name: Commander's Horn
horn.description: Doubles the strength of all unit cards in that row. Limited to 1 per row.

mardroeme.name: Mardroeme
mardroeme.description: Triggers transformation of all Berserker cards on the same row.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Transforms into a bear when a Mardroeme card is on its row.

scorch.name: Scorch
scorch.description: Discard after playing. Kills the strongest card(s) on the battlefield.

scorch_c.name: Scorch - Close Combat
scorch_c.description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.

scorch_r.name: Scorch - Ranged
scorch_r.description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.

scorch_s.name: Scorch - Siege
scorch_s.description: Destroys your enemy's strongest Siege Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege Combat units is 10 or more.

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: Can be placed in either the Close Combat or the Ranged Combat row. Cannot be moved once placed.

muster.name: Muster
muster.description: Find any cards with the same name in your deck and play them instantly.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Place on your opponent's battlefield (counts towards your opponent's total) and draw 2 cards from your deck.

medic.name: Medic
medic.description: Choose one card from your discard pile and play it instantly (no Heroes or Special Cards).

morale.name: Morale
morale.description: Adds +1 to all units in the row (excluding itself).

bond.name: Tight Bond
bond.description: Place next to a card with the same name to double the strength of both cards.

avenger.name: Avenger
avenger.description: When this card is removed from the battlefield, it summons a powerful new Unit Card to take its place.

avenger_kambi.name: Avenger
avenger_kambi.description: When this card is removed from the battlefield, it summons a powerful new Unit Card to take its place.

foltest_king.description: Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.

foltest_lord.description: Clear any weather effects (resulting from Biting Frost, Torrential Rain or Impenetrable Fog cards) in play.

foltest_siegemaster.description: Doubles the strength of all your Siege units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

foltest_steelforged.description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Siege unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege units is 10 or more.

foltest_son.description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.

emhyr_imperial.description: Pick a Torrential Rain card from your deck and play it instantly.

emhyr_emperor.description: Look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand.

emhyr_relentless.description: Draw a card from your opponent's discard pile.

emhyr_invader.description: Medics cannot choose which card to revive and draw a random one from the graveyard (affects both players).

eredin_commander.description: Double the strength of all your Close Combat units (unless a Commander's horn is also present on that row).

eredin_bringer_of_death.name: Eredin : Bringer of Death
eredin_bringer_of_death.description: Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.

eredin_destroyer.description: Discard 2 card and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.

eredin_king.description: Pick any weather card from your deck and play it instantly.

eredin_treacherous.description: Doubles the strength of all spy cards (affects both players).

francesca_queen.description: Destroy your enemy's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.

francesca_beautiful.description: Doubles the strength of all your Ranged Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

francesca_daisy.description: Draw an extra card at the beginning of the battle.

francesca_pureblood.description: Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.

francesca_hope.description: Move agile units to whichever valid row maximizes their strength (don't move units already in optimal row).

crach_an_craite.description: Shuffle all cards from each player's graveyard back into their decks.

king_bran.description: Units only lose half their Strength in bad weather conditions.
